dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Map by Schedel ; cut in wood and illustrated by Michael Wohlgemut ; illustrated by Wilhelm Pleydenwurff.
Shows topography and places of historical interest; an imaginary view of the destruction of Jerusalem.
Descriptive text above map; verso features illustrations of structures and men.
At head of title: Quarta etas mundi -- Foliu LXIIII.
Collector's note: 1493 imaginary picture of Jerusalem burning Contemporary colors, mainly brown some green. (Laor 1125).
